data.title: Addleshaw Goddard LLP
data.meta_description: Law firm to many of the world's best-known and most remarkable clients. They rely on us to find imaginative solutions to their pivotal business problems.
data.text:
Law Firm of the Year

Our innovative approach to law, commitment to client service excellence, and the growth trajectory of the firm over the past year has seen us be named 'Law Firm of the Year' at The Lawyer Awards 2024. Thank you to all of our wonderful clients for making it possible.

Find out more

Welcome

Welcome to Addleshaw Goddard – an international law firm, almost 250 years in the making. We’re trusted by over 5000 organisations, including 50 FTSE 100 companies, to solve problems, deliver deals, defend rights, comply with regulations and mitigate risk. Our work spans more than 50 areas of business law for clients across multiple industries in over 100 countries worldwide. And while the challenges our clients bring us may vary, we approach and solve them with the same, single-minded focus: finding the smartest way to achieve the biggest impact.

Discover more

Doing Business Globally: 45 minute guides to key business and legal trends

Join this six-part, fast-paced webinar series where we will shine a spotlight on key business and legal insights in six important business locations around the world.

Register now

Responsible Business

Addleshaw Goddard is committed to the ongoing journey of having as positive an impact as possible on the world around us – just as we are committed to helping our clients with their journeys. Find out more about that commitment in action, covering diversity, inclusion, community activity, sustainability, and more.

Find out more

Harness Generative AI

If you are harnessing GenAI in your business (or are interested in doing so), download two, free legal guides that shine a light on some myths, risks and mitigation when it comes to using GenAI within in-house legal functions and business.

Find out more

Exclusive panel event: Best practice for boards handling challenging investigations

Join us for a fast-paced and practical session where we will guide you through real-life crisis scenarios arising in boardrooms, providing insights on how boards should react to corporate misconduct and its escalating complexities.

Register your interest
